page.title: 12FUN AT HORSE SHOWS AND FETES
page.content: On Sun. April 28th I was really excited about the Wythall Horse Show.I went up to the stable yard in Houndsfield Lane and groomed my horse "Lady Gem".Then I went to the show and won{3}clear rounds!I won the Chase-Me-Charlie but lost two races.Dad took some photos and I went home happy.We{really}enjoyed the Vicarage Garden Party. We raised Â£500 for St. Mary's organ and there were lots of sideshows. I won a teddy bear.Mum bought a lot of cakes and plants.{But}the best fete was the big one on Becketts field for the Maypole Church.We had thirty side shows with Aunt Sallies and Break The Crocks. I won a big coconut and broke lots of cups. Then I went on the huge bouncing castle that you could see for miles. We raised over Â£1000 .{Meadow Green { }
